os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: OS X

name: Xris Malden Mac OS X and PDF print
short_description:
Imprimer depuis n'importe quelle application Mac OS X avec son propre arrière plan (papier en-tête, ...) ... c'est possible 

1) installer PDFtk via MacPorts (http://www.macports.org)

2) installer le package PDF print with your own background.pkg (see Files)

3) créer votre propre arrière-plan en PDF dans Documents/PDF/background.pdf

puis depuis la fenêtre d'impression PDF > PDF print with your own background

... le document final est stocké dans Documents/PDF/<Année>/<mois> du jour

--- 

PDF print with your own background in Mac OS X is so easy

1) install PDFtk with MacPorts (http://www.macports.org)

2) install package PDF print with your own background.pkg (see Files)

3) create your own PDF background in Documents/PDF/background.pdf

from Printing interface of any else application PDF > PDF print with your own background

this kind of virtual printer open Preview application but file is stored in  Documents/PDF/<year>/<month>
summary: PDF print with your own background
